title: Gerald Willfurth
text:
Gerald Willfurth (born November 6, 1962) is a retired <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> <a href="midfielder">midfielder</a> from <a href="Austria">Austria</a>.
During his club career, Willfurth notably played for <a href="Rapid%20Wien">Rapid Wien</a> and <a href="FC%20Red%20Bull%20Salzburg">SV Austria Salzburg</a>.
